doc:
Pauline Johnson (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pauline_Johnson_(actress) 0 Pauline Johnson (3 November 1899 – 13 February 1947) was an English film actress. She was a leading lady of British films during the silent era. She was born Katherine Johnson in Newcastle upon Tyne, Northumberland, England and died in Sherborne, Sturminster, Dorset England in 1947. Pauline_Johnson ( 3_November_1899 – 13_February_1947 ) was an_English_film_actress . She was a_leading_lady of British_films during the_silent_era . She was_born Katherine_Johnson in Newcastle upon Tyne , Northumberland , England and died in Sherborne , Sturminster , Dorset_England in 1947 .
